focus: Approach II and Approach III methods (with E2-odd-alt and interface dependencies)

node_roles: B: bridge verdict to P7 obligations

diagrams.title: The equivariant Spivak normal bundle and equivariant surgery for compact Lie groups
diagrams.why: Core candidate for equivariant Spivak + surgery normal-structure control.

nodes.body_text: Construct equivariant normal data for group actions so fixed-set surgery can be controlled.
Model manifold action with equivariant Spivak normal bundle rather than only ordinary normal data.
Use equivariant surgery input to build/compare normal maps compatible with the action.
